name: Superhard Soldiers
description:
A run and shot game about the war of people and aliens. You are a comander of the squads of the soldiers that take a part of attack the aliens's city 'Cide-city'. Help the aliance to win the war. you will have to fight enemy soldiers, drones and heavy weapon on your way. But there is some thing more dangerous in the city dungeons...

  • 7 interesting levels
  • More 15 hard enemies
  • Four weapons and their modiffications
  • Dinamic gameplay and nice music 
  • Single player and two player mode

Enjoy!
